programmersDay.title: Happy Programmer's Day! ðŸ’»
programmersDay.message:
Today is the 256th day of the year, which means it's International Programmer's Day!

Which you, as always, spend at the computer! Go outside, get some fresh air! Your pale skin suggests you really need it!

And if you're not a developer but a regular user, what are you doing here? ðŸ¤¨ Anyway, now you know what day it is! Congratulate your developer friend on their professional holiday!
